      Sets up the pending activity object required to use foreground dispatch Uses PendingIntent.getActivity() to instantiate the object and then creates an array of IntentFilters and a techList array.

      Event handler for write button Hide keyboard to make sure status box is visible Hide instructions and welcome message Show status bar and message area Create NDEF message Enable foreground dispatch - implement writing to tag in onNewIntent()

      • cancelButton

        public void cancelButton(View theButton)
        Button handler for cancel button Ends write mode Disables foreground dispatch Updates status message to user Re-enable write button Hide cancel button
        Parameters:
        theButton -

      • createNdefMessage

        public NdefMessage createNdefMessage()
        Called when write button is pressed This method prepares a properly formed NDEF message using the custom mime type taken from this app's package name. If EditText is empty do nothing and return error Else take the entered text and create an NDEF message from it
        Returns:
        the created NDEF message

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when app is started Assign global TextView, statusDisplay Initialise writeMode to false Prepare pending activity

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

        If write mode active, write text to tag in intent

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Hide onscreen keyboard.

      • setupPendingActivity

        public void setupPendingActivity()
        Sets up the pending activity object required to use foreground dispatch Uses PendingIntent.getActivity() to instantiate the object and then creates an array of IntentFilters and a techList array. This is called from onCreate();

      • writeButton

        public void writeButton(View theView)
        Event handler for write button Hide keyboard to make sure status box is visible Hide instructions and welcome message Show status bar and message area Create NDEF message Enable foreground dispatch - implement writing to tag in onNewIntent()
        Parameters:
        theView - requires as this is called in response to button press

      • writeToTag

        public void writeToTag(Ndef ndefTag)
        Uses runnable to write a message to a tag Perform required validation (message isn't tull, tag isn't read only, etc) Write to tag Update status message area with error or success
        Parameters:
        ndefTag -
